judgment_text:
907-CMP-2-1989 IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY NAGPUR BENCH, NAGPUR. COMPANY PETITION NO. 2 OF 1989 (In the matter of M/s Unique Land and Housing Devp. Ltd. (In Liqn.)) __________________________________________________________________________ Office Notes, Office Memoranda of Coram, appearances, Court's orders of directions Court's or Judge's orders. and Registrar's Orders. Dr. Anjan De, Counsel for the Official Liquidator with Ms. U.P. Parmar, Official Liquidator.

CORAM : ANIL L. PANSARE, J.

SEPTEMBER 27, 2024 In compliance to order dated 13/9/2024, the Official Liquidator has tendered across the bar report stating therein that total amount to the credit of the Company is/was Rs.3,500/-. Claim received from creditors is Rs.32,800/-. The Official Liquidator further submits that there are no assets of the Company, which can be now sold. She further submits that Rs.3,500/- has been spent for administrative expenses. The report is taken on record. ] Thus, it appears that the Official Liquidator cannot proceed with winding-up of Company for want of funds and assets. It will be, thus, just and reasonable to pass order of dissolution of the Company. ] Accordingly, the Company Unique Land And Housing Development Finance Private Limited stands dissolved in terms of sub-section (1) of Section 481 of the Companies Act, 1956 (for short the said Act ). ] Copy of order shall be forwarded by the Official Liquidator to the Registrar of the Company in terms of sub-section (2) of Section 481 of the said Act. :BHC-NAG:10802 -CMP-2-1989 ] Proceedings stand closed. (JUDGE) Sumit Signed by: Mr. Sumit Agrawal Designation: PA To Honourable Judge Date: 27/09/2024 18:15:28
